author: CBC News
title: Trudeau: Canada, U.S. strike deal to extend border restrictions by 30 days
description: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau says that Canada and the United States have struck a deal to extend current border restrictions between the two countries by an additional 30 days.
content:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau says Canada and the United States have struck a deal to extend current border restrictions between the two countries by an additional 30 days.
